data.comment: The match is underway at Guldensporenstadion.

Kortrijk are pushing forward but Ilombe Mboyo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Antwerp goal kick.
Throw-in for Kortrijk at Guldensporenstadion.

Throw-in for Antwerp in the half of Kortrijk.
Antwerp drives forward and Ivo Rodrigues gets in a shot. Without netting, however.

In Kortrijk, Ivo Rodrigues of Antwerp is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Kortrijk needs to be cautious. Antwerp have an attacking throw-in.
Important block from the Kortrijk defence as Wesley Hoedt fires in a strike for Antwerp.

Dieumerci Mbokani hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Kortrijk for Antwerp.

The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Kortrijk.

Koji Miyoshi (Antwerp) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.

In Kortrijk Antwerp drive forward through Faris Haroun. His shot is on target but it's saved.

At Guldensporenstadion, Habib Gueye has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Antwerp make their third substitution with Abdoulaye Seck replacing Didier Lamkel Ze.
Antwerp drive upfield and Dieumerci Mbokani gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kortrijk defender.
